page.title: 05Leisure Pursuits, Milnathort
page.content: Children in this area may join the Cub Scouts, Scouts, Brownies or Girl Guides. Some children play in the accordion band. For adults there are numerous leisure activities including Badminton,Bridge, Bowling, Rifle Shooting,Golf and Yoga. The Golf Club has a membership of 420. An enthusiastic amateur football team, currently very successful, is run by a local businessman. The team puts in a weekly, rigorous training session, all year round. The Women's Guild (Orwell Church) and the Milnathort branch of the W.R.I. are popular organisations with the ladies of the parish, and meet in the church hall and Milnathort town hall. Kinross-shire Round Table and Kinross- shire Rotary Club meet in the Royal Hotel, Milnathort.
